Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: According to news media people today are struggling with tough economic times in Australia. The upcoming federal budget has been a hot topic for debate with the Australian Chamber of Commerce and Industry advising that expenditure and energy supply should be prioritized over tax increases. Meanwhile aged-care providers have come under scrutiny for failing to meet quality and safety reforms and Bill Shorten's 'State of the Union' address at the National Press Club has been awaited eagerly for his proposals on industrial relations reform.
